title: New York Firm Recalls Boneless Veal Products Due To Possible E. Coli Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, August 9, 2013 United Processing LLC, a New York Mills, NY firm, is recalling approximately 12,600 pounds of boneless veal products because they may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, E. coli O145 and E. coli O45 the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety...
